      • TTL

        public static long TTL
        Token time to live in seconds. Default for Android SDK is 45 days. Must be in seconds

    • Constructor Detail

      • SessionManager

        public SessionManager(ShopGun shopGun)

    • Method Detail

      • recoverableError

        public static boolean recoverableError(ShopGunError e)
        Method for determining is a given error is an error that the SessionManager. Should, and can recover from.
        Parameters:
        e - - error to check
        Returns:
        true if SessionManager can recover from this error, else false

      • isSessionError

        public static boolean isSessionError(ShopGunError e)
        Method for determining if an error is a session error. This is determined from the error code given by the API. Note that SessionManager isn't nescessarily able to recover from all session errors, so please check recoverableError() before retrying.
        Parameters:
        e - - error to check
        Returns:
        true if it's a session error

      • recover

        public boolean recover(ShopGunError e)
        Ask the SessionManager to refresh the session.
        Parameters:
        e - A ShopGunError to recover from.
        Returns:
        true if SessionManager is trying, or will try to refresh the session. False if no more tries will be attempted.

      • getRequestInFlight

        public Request<?> getRequestInFlight()
        Get the current session request in flight, for a Session update. If the SessionManager isn't performing a Session update then null will be returned.
        Returns:
        A Request if one is in flight, else null

      • isRequestInFlight

        public boolean isRequestInFlight()
        Check if SessionManager is currently performing a Session update.
        Returns:
        true if Session is being updated, else false

      • login

        public JsonObjectRequest login(java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String password,
                               Response.Listener<org.json.JSONObject> l)
        Perform a standard login, using an existing ShopGun user.
        Parameters:
        email - - ShopGun user name (e-mail)
        password - for user
        l - for callback on complete
        Returns:
        The Request generated to perform the action. The request have already been queued for processing in the RequestQueue.

      • loginFacebook

        public JsonObjectRequest loginFacebook(java.lang.String facebookAccessToken,
                                       Response.Listener<org.json.JSONObject> l)
        Login to ShopGun, using a Facebook token.
        This requires you to implement the Facebook SDK, and relay the Facebook token.
        Parameters:
        facebookAccessToken - A facebook access token
        l - lister for callbacks
        Returns:
        The Request generated to perform the action. The request have already been queued for processing in the RequestQueue.

      • isFacebookSession

        public boolean isFacebookSession()
        Tell if current session is from facebook.
        Returns:
        true if current session is a facebook session, else false

      • signout

        public JsonObjectRequest signout(Response.Listener<org.json.JSONObject> l)
        Signs a user out, and cleans all references to the user.

        A new login(String, String, com.shopgun.android.sdk.network.Response.Listener) login} is needed to get access to user stuff again.
        Parameters:
        l - A request listener
        Returns:
        The Request generated to perform the action. The request have already been queued for processing in the RequestQueue.

      • createUser

        public JsonObjectRequest createUser(java.lang.String email,
                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    int birthYear,
                                    java.lang.String gender,
                                    java.lang.String locale,
                                    java.lang.String successRedirect,
                                    java.lang.String errorRedirect,
                                    Response.Listener<org.json.JSONObject> l)
        Create a new ShopGun user.
        Parameters:
        email - An email
        password - A password
        name - A name
        birthYear - A birthyear
        gender - A gender
        locale - A Locale string
        successRedirect - An URL to include in the validation email, given registration succeeded
        errorRedirect - An URL to include in the validation email, given registration failed
        l - A request listener
        Returns:
        The Request generated to perform the action. The request have already been queued for processing in the RequestQueue.

      • forgotPassword

        public JsonObjectRequest forgotPassword(java.lang.String email,
                                        java.lang.String successRedirect,
                                        java.lang.String errorRedirect,
                                        Response.Listener<org.json.JSONObject> l)
        Method for requesting a password reset.
        Parameters:
        email - of the user
        successRedirect - An URL to include in the validation email, given registration succeeded
        errorRedirect - An URL to include in the validation email, given registration failed
        l - lister for callbacks
        Returns:
        The Request generated to perform the action. The request have already been queued for processing in the RequestQueue.

      • getSession

        public Session getSession()
        Get the current session
        Returns:
        a session.

      • updateTokens

        public void updateTokens(java.lang.String headerToken,
                         java.lang.String headerExpires)
        Update current session, with new headers from server (these are given as return headers, on all requests)
        Parameters:
        headerToken - X-Token received in headers from from eta api
        headerExpires - The expires string received in headers from from eta api

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate()
        Destroys this session.
        A new session will be generated, on first request to server.
